title: Deepfake ad of Mark Zuckerberg praises Congress for inaction on antitrust legislation
text:
Activist group Demand Progress is behind the two-and-a-half minute spot following repeated attempts by consumer advocates urging the House and Senate to vote on a bill that would prevent Big Tech from giving its products preferential treatment over rivals and alleviate Alphabet Inc.'s GOOGL GOOG Google and Apple Inc.'s AAPL sway over app developers.

The ad concludes with this disclaimer: "The Zuck is fake, but the message is real." It urges citizens to contact Senate Majority Leader Chuck Schumer, D-N.Y., and demand a vote on legislation before the next session of Congress convenes in January.

Meta could not be immediately reached for comment.

Deepfake ad of Mark Zuckerberg praises Congress for inaction on antitrust legislation
